name: ts-for-gir-node-gtk-http-example
description: Node-gtk example showing how to build a http server/client using Soap 3

scripts.build:types: npm run ts-for-gir -- generate Soup-3.0 -e node --useNamespace -t esm
scripts.build: npm run build:types && npm run build:app
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run start:server
scripts.validate: npm run validate:types && npm run validate:app
